answers.answer: I have a little swelling. My dr. saod it's normal especially because it's getting hotter. Drink more water and elevate your feet.

question: Does anyone else have intense swelling in their feet? The doctor has already ruled out preeclampsia but my feet are huge. I can't fit them in my shoes and they look like balloons. Just curious if anyone else is experiencing this?
title: Swollen Feet
